hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #Goron City#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Bow#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #the Fire Arrows#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #the Iron Boots# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Bombchu Shop#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.
